00030 ultimix.forms.EnterProcessor = function( e , Id )
00031 {
00032       if( e.keyCode == 13 )
00033       {
00034             document.getElementById( Id ).submit();
00035       }
00036 }

00047 ultimix.forms.TripleSetCheckboxClick = function( Id , Name )
00048 {
00049       Checkbox = document.getElementById( '_checkbox_' + Id );
00050       Value = document.getElementById( Id );
00051       
00052       if( Value.value == 0 )
00053       {
00054             Checkbox.checked = 1;
00055             Checkbox.disabled = false;
00056             Value.value = 1;
00057             return;
00058       }
00059       
00060       if( Value.value == 1 )
00061       {
00062             Checkbox.checked = 1;
00063             Checkbox.disabled = true;
00064             Value.value = 2;
00065             return;
00066       }
00067       
00068       if( Value.value == 2 )
00069       {
00070             Checkbox.checked = 0;
00071             Checkbox.disabled = false;
00072             Value.value = 0;
00073             return;
00074       }
00075 }

00086 ultimix.forms.DoubleSetCheckboxClick = function( Id , Name )
00087 {
00088       Checkbox = document.getElementById( '_checkbox_' + Id );
00089       Value = document.getElementById( Id );
00090 
00091       if( Value.value == 0 )
00092       {
00093             Checkbox.checked = 1;
00094             Value.value = 1;
00095             return;
00096       }
00097       
00098       if( Value.value == 1 )
00099       {
00100             Checkbox.checked = 0;
00101             Value.value = 0;
00102             return;
00103       }
00104 }

00119 ultimix.forms.SubmitForm0 = function( FormId , ConfirmString , Action , Waiting )
00120 {
00121       if( document.getElementById( FormId ) == null )
00122       {
00123             ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( 'Form ' + FormId + ' was not found' , ultimix.get_string( 'Error' ) , ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_OK | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONERROR | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL );
00124             return;
00125       }
00126       
00127       Success = function( Result )
00128       {
00129             if( Result == ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_YES )
00130             {
00131                   if( Action )
00132                   {
00133                         document.getElementById( FormId ).setAttribute( 'action' , Action );
00134                   }
00135                   document.getElementById( FormId ).submit();
00136                   
00137                   if( Waiting )
00138                   {
00139                         ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( ultimix.get_string( 'wait_please' ) , ultimix.get_string( 'Info' ) , ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONLOADING | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL );
00140                   }
00141             }
00142       }
00143       
00144       if( ConfirmString )
00145       {
00146             ultimix.std_dialogs.MessageBox( ConfirmString , ultimix.get_string( 'Question' ) , ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_YESNO | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_ICONQUESTION | ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_MODAL , Success );
00147             return;
00148       }
00149       
00150       Success( ultimix.std_dialogs.MB_YES );
00151 }

00369 ultimix.forms.ExtractFormData = function( Selector )
00370 {
00371       var   Items = jQuery( Selector ).find( '*' ).andSelf();
00372       var   Data = new Object();
00373       
00374       for( var i = 0 ; i < Items.length ; i++ )
00375       {
00376             var               TagName = jQuery( Items[ i ] ).attr( 'tagName' );
00377             TagName = TagName.toLowerCase();
00378             
00379             if( TagName == 'input' )
00380             {
00381                   var               TagType = jQuery( Items[ i ] ).attr( 'type' );
00382                   TagType = TagType.toLowerCase();
00383                   
00384                   if( TagType == 'checkbox' )
00385                   {
00386                         if( jQuery( Items[ i ] ).attr( 'checked' ) )
00387                         {
00388                               Data[ jQuery( Items[ i ] ).attr( 'name' ) ] = 1;
00389                         }
00390                         else
00391                         {
00392                               Data[ jQuery( Items[ i ] ).attr( 'name' ) ] = 0;
00393                         }
00394                         continue;
00395                   }
00396                   if( TagType == 'radio' )
00397                   {
00398                         if( jQuery( Items[ i ] ).attr( 'checked' ) != '' )
00399                         {
00400                               Data[ jQuery( Items[ i ] ).attr( 'name' ) ] = jQuery( Items[ i ] ).val();
00401                         }
00402                         continue;
00403                   }
00404                   if( TagType == 'text' || TagType == 'hidden' || TagType == 'password' )
00405                   {
00406                         Data[ jQuery( Items[ i ] ).attr( 'name' ) ] = jQuery( Items[ i ] ).val();
00407                         continue;
00408                   }
00409             }
00410             if( TagName == 'textarea' )
00411             {
00412                   Data[ jQuery( Items[ i ] ).attr( 'name' ) ] = jQuery( Items[ i ] ).val();
00413                   continue;
00414             }
00415             if( TagName == 'select' )
00416             {
00417                   Data[ jQuery( Items[ i ] ).attr( 'name' ) ] = jQuery( Items[ i ] ).children( ':selected' ).eq( 0 ).val();
00418                   continue;
00419             }
00420       }
00421       
00422       return( Data );
00423 }
